block.label: Logistics

radio.label: Location
radio.title: Sample Source (web) / Location (web to clt)
radio.row: Oi Research- Online Interactive Research Limited

text.label: LocationCode
text.title: This is used to assign each location's unique identifying code from the Location question row label. Do not edit.

block.note: Edit logic based on country - if one country, use "True", if multiple countries, assign based on sample company. Make sure field department knows to alert you if they are adding a sample company

html.label: Intro
html.p:
Hello and welcome to our survey!
Thank you in advance for your participation. This study is very important to us and we ask that you answer each question carefully and completely.
While going through the survey, please use the scroll bar on the right and bottom of your screen to move up and down through questions and images. Please remember that there are no right or wrong answers. We are only interested in your opinions.
Thank you again! Let’s begin…

checkbox.label: S_PastParticipation
checkbox.title: Have you participated in a market research study within the past 2 weeks, on any of the following topics?

checkbox.label: S_Industry
checkbox.title: Do you, or does anyone in your immediate family work for any of the following industries?
checkbox.row: Advertising agency or Public Relations Firms
A graphic design or packaging firm
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution or sale of Hair Care products
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution or sale of Toothpaste products
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution or sale of Deodorant/Antiperspirant products

term.label: TERM_Industry
term.cond: (S_Industry.r1 or S_Industry.r2 or S_Industry.r3 or S_Industry.r5)

select.label: S_GroceryShop
select.title: How much of the household’s grocery shopping do you, yourself, do?

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: With which gender do you identify most?

autofill.label: GenderVersion
autofill.title: Selected version if not selected Male or Female.

number.label: S_Age
number.title: Please type in your age below.

radio.label: S_Frequency
radio.title: How often have you purchased products in each of the following categories in the past 12 months?

radio.label: v_FreqClutter1
radio.title: Virtual for Weighting - Clutter1 Frequency - DO NOT MODIFY
radio.virtual: if S_Frequency.r1.c1: data.val=0 if S_Frequency.r1.c2: data.val=1 if S_Frequency.r1.c3: data.val=2 if S_Frequency.r1.c4: data.val=3 if S_Frequency.r1.c5: data.val=4 if S_Frequency.r1.c6: data.val=5 if S_Frequency.r1.c7: data.val=6

radio.label: v_FreqTestCat
radio.title: Virtual for weighting Frequency Test Category- DO NOT MODIFY
radio.virtual: if S_Frequency.r3.c1: data.val=0 if S_Frequency.r3.c2: data.val=1 if S_Frequency.r3.c3: data.val=2 if S_Frequency.r3.c4: data.val=3 if S_Frequency.r3.c5: data.val=4 if S_Frequency.r3.c6: data.val=5 if S_Frequency.r3.c7: data.val=6

radio.label: v_FreqClutter2
radio.title: Virtual for Weighting - Clutter2 Frequency - DO NOT MODIFY
radio.virtual: if S_Frequency.r2.c1: data.val=0 if S_Frequency.r2.c2: data.val=1 if S_Frequency.r2.c3: data.val=2 if S_Frequency.r2.c4: data.val=3 if S_Frequency.r2.c5: data.val=4 if S_Frequency.r2.c6: data.val=5 if S_Frequency.r2.c7: data.val=6

checkbox.label: S_Brand_PastPurchased
checkbox.title: Which brand or brands of Toothpaste have you purchased in the past 6 months?

radio.label: S_Brand_BUMO
radio.title: And which one brand of Toothpaste have you purchased most often in the past 6 months?

autofill.label: S_Brand_PastPurchased1
autofill.title: Usage Past purchased (P3M, P6M, P12M) - User/Non User for Database
autofill.row: Test Brand User - all test brands netted

autofill.label: S_Brand_BUMO1
autofill.title: BUMO - User/Non User for Database
autofill.row: Test Brand User - all test brands netted

block.label: Quotas

row.label: r1
row.autofill: S_Brand_PastPurchased.r4 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r5 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r6 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r7 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r9 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r10

row.label: r5
row.autofill: S_Brand_PastPurchased.r11 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r12 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r13 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r14 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r15 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r16 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r17 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r18 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r19 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r20

row.label: r6
row.autofill: S_Brand_PastPurchased.r23 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r24 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r25 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r26 or S_Brand_PastPurchased.r27

row.label: r1
row.autofill: S_Brand_BUMO.r4 or S_Brand_BUMO.r5 or S_Brand_BUMO.r6 or S_Brand_BUMO.r7 or S_Brand_BUMO.r9 or S_Brand_BUMO.r10

row.label: r5
row.autofill: S_Brand_BUMO.r11 or S_Brand_BUMO.r12 or S_Brand_BUMO.r13 or S_Brand_BUMO.r14 or S_Brand_BUMO.r15 or S_Brand_BUMO.r16 or S_Brand_BUMO.r17 or S_Brand_BUMO.r18 or S_Brand_BUMO.r19 or S_Brand_BUMO.r20

row.label: r6
row.autofill: S_Brand_BUMO.r23 or S_Brand_BUMO.r24 or S_Brand_BUMO.r25 or S_Brand_BUMO.r26 or S_Brand_BUMO.r27

block.exec: if PhaseQ.r1: Phase.val=0 if PhaseQ.r2: Phase.val=1 if PhaseQ.r3: Phase.val=2

autofill.label: PACKIMGIAT
autofill.title: Pack image both for both sample

block.label: AgreementBlock
block.note: THIS QUESTION SHOULD BE LEFT IN TO ENSURE QUALITY OF INTERVIEWING AND THAT IT'S NOT A BOT TAKING THE SURVEY

radio.label: RedHerringCheck
radio.title: Which of the following is not a color?

radio.label: Agreement
radio.title:
Respondent Confidentiality Disclosure Agreement (RCDA)
Congratulations!
• Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of Behaviorally, formerly PRS. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand that it will involve Confidential Information and you must agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, you will not be eligible to participate in this study. By signing this agreement, you agree as follows:
• You will use information or material disclosed to you or which may be available as part of this study only for the purpose of participating in this study, and you will not otherwise use the information or material for your own benefit or the benefit of any third party.
• You agree to keep confidential and not disclose, copy, transmit, or use for any purpose other than your participation in this study any information or material disclosed or made available to you as part of the study, including about products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this study. Any disclosure, copying, transmitting or misuse of any information or material in any form (including hard copy and/or electronic/data) whether intentional or unintentional may subject you to disqualification, and any other remedies available to Behaviorally or its study partners in law or equity.
• You agree that Behaviorally (and its partners) will be irreparably harmed and monetary damages may not be adequate compensation if you fail to meet your obligations under this agreement, and that, in addition to other remedies, Behaviorally (or its partners) shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief to prevent any threatened or continued breach. The parties hereby waive any requirements for security for obtaining any provisional relief.
• Each of Behaviorally’s partners is an intended third-party beneficiary of this agreement and each partner may enforce the terms of this agreement.
As further detailed in our privacy policy (https://www.behaviorally.com/privacy-policy), we take reasonable precautions to protect the privacy and security of your information during the market research survey. All information collected as part of this survey is treated in accordance with our online privacy policy and is destroyed 2 months after you have taken this survey.
You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation.
Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by checking the agreement below.

row.label: r1
row.b: I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

text.label: DateTime
text.title: DateTime
text.exec:
from datetime import datetime
cur_time = datetime.now() DateTime.val = cur_time.strftime("%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

block.label: ShoppingSection
block.builder:title: Shopping Section

pipe.label: continue_text
pipe.case: Please click the Continue button to proceed

html.label: Maximize
html.strong:
Throughout this survey, you are going to be shown several pictures. Please be sure that you maximize your window at this time, such that you can see these pictures with as much clarity as possible. You can also mouse over the images to see them magnified at any time.
Press F11 for full screen.

number.label: resp_id
number.title: Respondent ID

block.html: The following exercises will be repeated several times. Please answer each question carefully and completely.
We are going to show you 4 toothpaste pack designs and would like you to review and answer the questions that follow, similar sets of questions will be presented to you 4 times.

block.label: b1
block.builder:title: default loop block
block.html: You are now going to be shown a picture on the screen. Please pay attention as it’s going to be a very short exposure.

checkbox.label: F_Flash1a_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.title: Please review the image. After 1.5 seconds, you will automatically be advanced to the next page.

textarea.label: F_Flash1a_OE_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Please describe everything you saw, even if you are not sure about it.
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.html: You are now going to be shown a picture on the screen. Please pay attention as it’s going to be a very short exposure.

checkbox.label: F_Flash1b_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.title: Please review the image. After 1.5 seconds, you will automatically be advanced to the next page.

textarea.label: F_Flash1b_OE_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Please describe everything you saw, even if you are not sure about it.
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.html: You are now going to be shown a picture on the screen. Please pay attention as it’s going to be a very short exposure.

checkbox.label: F_Flash1c_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.title: Please review the image. After 1.5 seconds, you will automatically be advanced to the next page.

textarea.label: F_Flash1c_OE_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Please describe everything you saw, even if you are not sure about it.
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.html: You are now going to be shown a picture on the screen. Please pay attention as it’s going to be a very short exposure.

checkbox.label: F_Flash1d_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.title: Please review the image. After 1.5 seconds, you will automatically be advanced to the next page.

textarea.label: F_Flash1d_OE_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Please describe everything you saw, even if you are not sure about it.
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.html: You are now going to see a series of statements or attributes on your screen. Please pay attention as it’s going to be very quick. As soon as a statement appears you will have 6 seconds to click on the product that you think best applies to the statement.

radio.label: Q_IATx4_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: Will provide a long lasting clean

radio.label: Q_IATx5_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: Is the best option for toothpaste

block.html: For the next few questions, please focus your attention on the Colgate Max Fresh packaging you see here.

radio.label: Q_PI_[loopvar: label]
radio.title:
How likely would you be to buy Colgate Max Fresh, if it were available for the price below?
[loopvar: PACKIMGIATrows]

checkbox.label: vIM1B_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.title: Test IAT Summary Table
checkbox.exec:
if (Q_IATx1_[loopvar: label].r1) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r1.c1.val=1 if (Q_IATx1_[loopvar: label].r2) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r1.c2.val=1 if (Q_IATx1_[loopvar: label].r3) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r1.c3.val=1
if (Q_IATx2_[loopvar: label].r1) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r2.c1.val=1 if (Q_IATx2_[loopvar: label].r2) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r2.c2.val=1 if (Q_IATx2_[loopvar: label].r3) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r2.c3.val=1
if (Q_IATx3_[loopvar: label].r1) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r3.c1.val=1 if (Q_IATx3_[loopvar: label].r2) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r3.c2.val=1 if (Q_IATx3_[loopvar: label].r3) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r3.c3.val=1
if (Q_IATx4_[loopvar: label].r1) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r4.c1.val=1 if (Q_IATx4_[loopvar: label].r2) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r4.c2.val=1 if (Q_IATx4_[loopvar: label].r3) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r4.c3.val=1
if (Q_IATx5_[loopvar: label].r1) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r5.c1.val=1 if (Q_IATx5_[loopvar: label].r2) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r5.c2.val=1 if (Q_IATx5_[loopvar: label].r3) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r5.c3.val=1
if (Q_IATx6_[loopvar: label].r1) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r6.c1.val=1 if (Q_IATx6_[loopvar: label].r2) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r6.c2.val=1 if (Q_IATx6_[loopvar: label].r3) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r6.c3.val=1
if (Q_IATx7_[loopvar: label].r1) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r7.c1.val=1 if (Q_IATx7_[loopvar: label].r2) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r7.c2.val=1 if (Q_IATx7_[loopvar: label].r3) : vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r7.c3.val=1
if not(Q_IATx1_[loopvar: label].r1 or Q_IATx2_[loopvar: label].r1 or Q_IATx3_[loopvar: label].r1 or Q_IATx4_[loopvar: label].r1 or Q_IATx5_[loopvar: label].r1 or Q_IATx6_[loopvar: label].r1 or Q_IATx7_[loopvar: label].r1): vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r99.c1.val=1 if not(Q_IATx1_[loopvar: label].r2 or Q_IATx2_[loopvar: label].r2 or Q_IATx3_[loopvar: label].r2 or Q_IATx4_[loopvar: label].r2 or Q_IATx5_[loopvar: label].r2 or Q_IATx6_[loopvar: label].r2 or Q_IATx7_[loopvar: label].r2): vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r99.c2.val=1 if not(Q_IATx1_[loopvar: label].r3 or Q_IATx2_[loopvar: label].r3 or Q_IATx3_[loopvar: label].r3 or Q_IATx4_[loopvar: label].r3 or Q_IATx5_[loopvar: label].r3 or Q_IATx6_[loopvar: label].r3 or Q_IATx7_[loopvar: label].r3): vIM1B_[loopvar: label].r99.c3.val=1
checkbox.row: Will provide a long lasting clean
Is the best option for toothpaste
Did not choose product for any statement

strong.em: Now, just a few questions for classification purposes…

select.label: S_State
select.title: Please select the US state in which you currently live.

select.label: C_Employment
select.title: Which of the following best describes your current employment status?

select.label: STANDARD_EDUCATION
select.title: What is the highest level of education you have completed?
select.choice: Other post high school vocational training
Completed some college, but no degree
Completed some graduate, but no degree

select.label: STANDARD_INCOME
select.title: Please select the range that best represents your total annual household income.

select.label: STANDARD_ETHNICITY
select.title: Which of the following best describes you?
select.choice: Black or African American, or Black British

checkbox.label: STANDARD_ETHNICITY2
checkbox.title: Please select all of the following that describe you.
checkbox.row: Black or African American, or Black British

span.em: Thank you for your time and cooperation!
